roleset.name: populate

example.name: the one example
example.text: In a lovely, novelistic memoir, ``Sleeping Arrangements'' (Knopf, 195 pages, $18.95), she remembers [an exotic playground]-1, peopled [*]-1 mainly by Jewish eccentrics and the occasional Catholic (real oddballs like her sexpot friend, the hell-kitten Diana, age five).
example.arg: by Jewish eccentrics and the occasional Catholic (real oddballs like her sexpot friend, the hell-kitten Diana, age five)

roleset.note: Populate can take an agent, but people cannot (to my mind); hence thearg numbering.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'people' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.
